title: Online Mathematics Learning Design for EHEA Competency-Based Assessment

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematics knowledge at the secondary school level
context.additional_context: Competency-based math curriculum integrating self-directed learning and formative assessment in smartphone-centric constrained technology environments.

learning_goals: Learners can document weekly mathematics problem-solving processes and self-assess using a blog-based platform.
Learners can improve final outputs by revising problem-solving strategies based on peer and instructor feedback.
Learners can demonstrate EHEA core competencies (analytical thinking, self-direction, digital literacy) with over 80% proficiency.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
